product_name: Outdoor Research Sentinel Ubertube Neck Gaiter
long_description: It's a beanie, it's a balaclava, it's a scarf, it's the Sentinel Ubertube neck gaiter from Outdoor Research! Multifunctional polyester neck gaiter wicks away perspiration in the summer heat and provides just enough warmth during cold-weather, high-exertion activities. Wear the Ubertube in multiple configurations to meet your needs. EPA-registered, odorless Insect Shield(R) Apparel repels mosquitoes, ticks, ants, flies, chiggers and midges (no-see-ums) so you can enjoy your journey. Insect Shield(R) Repellent Apparel is effective through 70 washes. Outdoor Research Sentinel Ubertube neck gaiter measuers 20 x 9 in.
short_description: It's a beanie, it's a balaclava, it's a scarf, it's the Sentinel Ubertube neck gaiter from Outdoor Research!
